title: "THIS IS A PEARL!" MINT STUDIO-VIRT DM-LIV IN SUPR-SEP KIT-DW-CNTRL PK
posting_body: ['THIS IS A PEARL!!!', 'Meticulously Maintained Building', 'Live-In Super', '“MINT” Studio', '$2295', 'VIRTUAL DOORMAN', 'Separate Kitchen', 'Dishwasher', 'Comfortable Living Area', 'Freshly Prepared Full Bath', 'A/C Provided For Your Comfort', 'Sparkling Sunlight', 'Pretty View', 'High Ceilings', 'Hardwood floors', 'Heat & Hot Water Included', 'EFFORTLESS ACCESS TO:', 'Q, 4, 5, 6, Trains', '1.', '“EXCELLENT” Selection of', 'Shopping, Restaurants & Bars', '2.', 'Central Park “THE JEWEL of NYC”', '3.', 'Carl Schurtz Park', '4.', 'East River Promenade', '5.', 'Lightning Quick Access to get', 'Anywhere in the City', 'VIDEO:', 'https://youtu.be/CyvDp5LNsaw', 'Simply call MURPHY 🏃\u200d♂️☘️🕺', '(ASAP) to arrange a time to view & get additional details as I expect this “NICELY PRESENTED” studio to rent very quickly.', '917-691-4045']
